description: This file defines a React functional component for the login page of the ECM Bug Tracker front-end. It manages user input for email and password, handles form submission with basic validation, and calls an external login function. It also handles navigation upon successful login and displays errors otherwise.

methods.name: LoginPage
methods.description: React functional component for rendering and handling the login page interface.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs basic validation, simulates login, and navigates on success.
